review: I did not purchase this from Amazon, but received it as a gift, however, I felt I must leave a review of it anyway.  This is not a very user friendly device and is not intuitive, I guess I was spoiled by AppleTV.  I found that the controls were very slow to respond and setup was quite a bit more than effortless.  I have well higher than a gigabit internet connection and this thing lagged severely.I gave it three stars because, once you get acquainted with the chromecast's quirks, it does have decent features.  However, I did replace it with another AppleTV due to stability and ease of use Apple provides.  I understand that the Apple product costs a bit more, but I feel the difference is worth the upgrade.
